Up to Zero Leaks, Even from Blowouts: Our baby diapers have a curved and stretchy fit and are designed to help eliminate gaps at the legs and waist. Fast-Absorbing DryTouch Liner helps the diaper lock away 99% of wetness to help keep skin dry
Our Perfect Fitting Diaper: Huggies Little Movers Diapers are designed for worry-free running, jumping, and playing

The Only Leading Brand Entirely Fragrance Free**: All Huggies diapers are free of fragrance and elemental chlorine and made without parabens or natural rubber latex (**among leading national diaper brands, across all offered variants)

Unique Waistband: Huggies Little Movers diapers come with a waistband that is designed to prevent leaks and help keep your baby comfortable while on the move. Double Grip Strips help provide a secure, flexible fit that moves with your baby
body.description: Huggies Little Movers Baby Diapers are designed to stay in place through active play! These disposable baby diapers are designed for worry-free running, jumping and playing without any leaks or disruptions. Each Little Movers diaper is up to 100% leak-free (even for blowouts!) and offers up to 12 hours of comfortable protection to keep your baby active and clean. Our diapers feature a curved and stretchy fit and a flexible, yet secure waistband designed to prevent leaks and help keep your baby comfortable while on the move. Double Grip Strips provide a secure, flexible fit and the diaper is designed to help eliminate gaps at the legs and waist to protect against leaks and irritation. These Huggies diapers are extra soft and contoured around the legs to help provide red-mark free, gentle protection. Little Movers are made with a fast-absorbing DryTouch Liner and our baby diaper locks away 99% of wetness to help keep skin dry. Plus, a wetness indicator easily lets you know when your baby is ready for a diaper change. Little Movers Diapers are available in size 3 (16-28 lbs), size 4 (22-37 lbs), size 5 (27+ lbs), size 6 (35+ lbs) and size 7 (41+ lbs).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’ve tried LUVS, and PAMPERS AND THIS IS THE BEST
reviews.reviewText: Product: Huggies, Little Movers Baby DiapersI have been using Huggies Little Movers Baby Diapers for my little one, and I have to say, they are fantastic. Here's why I highly recommend them:First and foremost, the fit of these diapers is exceptional. They have a contoured shape and stretchy sides that ensure a snug and comfortable fit for my baby. The diapers stay in place even during active play, which is a great feature for little ones who are always on the move. I haven't experienced any leaks or blowouts while using these diapers, which gives me peace of mind.The absorbency of the Huggies Little Movers diapers is impressive. They are designed to quickly absorb wetness and lock it away, keeping my baby's skin dry and preventing any discomfort. Even after several hours of wear, the diapers remain dry on the inside, which is essential for my baby's comfort and overall health.I also appreciate the quality of the materials used in these diapers. They feel soft and gentle against my baby's sensitive skin, reducing the risk of irritation or rashes. The diapers are also hypoallergenic and free from any harmful chemicals, which is a priority for me as a parent.The Huggies Little Movers diapers have a convenient wetness indicator, which changes color when it's time for a diaper change. This feature is incredibly helpful, especially for new parents who may be unsure when to change their baby's diaper. It eliminates the guesswork and ensures that I can provide the best care for my little one.In terms of availability and pricing, Huggies Little Movers diapers are widely available in most stores and online retailers. They are competitively priced, offering excellent value for the quality and performance they provide.Overall, I highly recommend Huggies Little Movers Baby Diapers to parents looking for a reliable and high-quality diaper option. They offer a great fit, excellent absorbency, and are gentle on a baby's delicate skin. With these diapers, I feel confident that my baby is comfortable and protected throughout the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great diapers. Fit to size, soft, non saggy. My son pees a lot during his sleep and these huggie diapers never leak. We wake up to a huge diaper full of pee but no leaks!!We were using pamper swaddles but they kept leaking and I’d have to wake up in the middle of the night to change my baby’s whole outfit, not once have these leaked and they’re super cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Huggies Size 7 are perfect for our 9 year old autistic daughter
reviews.reviewText: Finally able to get my hands on Huggies Little Movers Size 7. Previously used Pampers Baby Dry and Pampers Cruisers for my 9 year old daughter that has autism.She isn't non-verbal but Potty Training has been like war, the past 2 times we tried. So I've continued with a combination of Pampers Cruisers Size 7 and Pampers Baby Dry Size 7, until now. The Huggies size 7 don't have air channels like the Pampers do, but I've found the huggies to be bigger/taller, better fitting, far more absorbant, smell less than the pampers (when dry and when wet), be more comfortable than the pampers (based on my 9yo daughter no longer having meltdowns over diaper changes or when she goes to the toilet in her diaper.She is able to wee/urinate in her diaper 4 to 5 times, before her Huggies will be full, and needs a change. No issues with going poo in her Huggies either, no blow-outs, no leaks, no tab breaks.Though one time, while I was changing her, she successfully managed to get one of her Huggies Little Movers Size 7 on her mommy's bottom, a testament to how big Size 7 Huggies diapers are I guess....The thicker and longer wetness indicator is great and she doesn't leak overnight, with a fresh or dry diaper on before she falls asleep. She usually goes through 1 diaper a night but it can sometimes be 2 diapers a night. During the day, it's sometimes 1 but usually 2 diapers per day.The Huggies size 7 also accommodates our daughters diaper alarm/humidity monitor, no problems (on the outside of her diaper, in between her legs, where girls begin urinating)

These diapers (HUGGIES little movers, snugglers etc) are the best diapers. No leaks, room for movement and lots of absorbency to keep the little tushy dry through the night. We strayed from this brand, just to give others a try... and were let down.

reviews.reviewTitle: Los mejores que hemos probado hasta ahora
reviews.reviewText: Me gusta mucho que ajustan Perfecto, lo cual no había encontrado en otras marcas de pañales, y a pesar de que estén muy saturados, difícilmente tienen fugas, había comprado otras marcas premium pero estos pañales las superan
Catch my baby's blowout like no other, and do not irritate.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy buen producto , aunque a veces escasea .
reviews.reviewText: Me gusta mucho y es de mejor calidad y precio que el supreme que se vende en Mexico , absorbe muy bien para los niños activos no se derrama ni se manchan de popo , simplemente una excelente opción , me gustaría que estuvieran más disponibles en stock a veces no hay y tarda en haber de vuelta .
Very happy with price, delivery time, packaging, product was exactly as advertised.
